website_summaries.verdict: Zarbee's Naturals helps keep the flu and its symptoms at bay.
pros: Zarbee's can provide cough relief in additional to cold and flu relief
The gummies have a soft texture that won't stick to your teeth
cons: With recommended doses, one jar won't last long

customer_reviews.title: Zarbee’s proves to have substandard quality control. Plastic found in gummy!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Found a large piece of plastic in one of the gummies. After reaching out to the Zarbee’s company and receiving no response, I feel it only fair to warn potential customers of our experience. A quick internet search brings up stories of metal being found in Zarbee’s gummies last month. This 1-star review is for the product. The seller shipped quickly and Amazon quickly refunded both bottles that were purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer  757

customer_reviews.title: Insane Sugar Overdose!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! These elderberry gummies are intensely sweet and covered in heaps of sugar! I'm kind of stunned, as this massive amount of sugar is counterproductive in an immune-boosting health product (it feels very targeted toward kids). I get that elderberry can be a bit tart on its own, but this is beyond overboard. The gummies are very sticky and the sugar sticks to your fingers and gets everywhere. Chewing the gummies slightly hurts my mouth and my sensitive teeth. I like most of the healthy ingredients, but this sugar overdose is just unnecessary. But I should mention that my mom likes these fine.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Immune boosting, I am proof
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these gummy‘s regularly now for over eight months. For the first time in five years, even though other people around me have been ill, my system has resisted. The Two times actually got sick, I was well in half the time. I am around young children every day. They are often sick I’m so happy I am not. I am over 60 and Prior to taking these I was sick nine out of 12 months a year for the past four years. This last year that I have been well,I owe it all to these immune boosting gummy’s. I look forward to taking them every day.
customer_reviews.author: sewbear

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: My kids ate these up! I have a 17, 16 and 3 yo. Purchased these to boost their immune system for the start of the school year. They loved the flavor but I'm not sure how much it helped, they took it every day for 2 weeks before school and my 3 yo still got sick, she did however get over it within about 4 days so maybe it sped the healing time up... I'll have to repurchase another bottle since they've finished it already and continue to evaluate it.
customer_reviews.author: ShayR

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the liquid form of elderberry but decided to try these for my kids.. they surprisingly taste good and my kids will actually eat them! I have been giving my kids these religiously all winter and I truly think it has helped them to stay healthy! They usually get sick ALL the time! They are 2,4 and 5 so around germs all the time! I swear by the elderberry and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging for sugar cubes
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, shame on you for price gouging this during this corona panic! The price has increased 35% in a week! That's immoral and actually illegal! Secondly, this stuff is mostly sugar. It's crazy how much sugar is not only in the gummies, but caked on the outside!
customer_reviews.author: William A. Harrison III

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!:) it's a little sweet for me but it beats being struck with the nasty virus/cold. That I had last year that would not go away,devastating:( had to go get antibiotics last year. This year frick not will I every get that back again!! I take zarbee's a few days( I normally take 1or 2) take a break and take a gummy multi-vitamin. Stay hydrated, wash ur hands when u are out and about, anyone sick in the house clean, lol . But anyways, I have not gotten sick this year!!:) stomach flu recommend carrying crystallized ginger to eat with water or flat coke soda.
customer_reviews.author: bren79

customer_reviews.title: These Really Work
customer_reviews.text: My work colleagues swear by these magical gummies and have been trying to make me a Zarbee's convert for months. I felt a cold coming on just 5 days before Christmas and my work friend loaned me her bottle of Zarbee's. So I take the Zarbee's, and take to my bed. At her insistence and standing over me at my desk, I order my own bottle, which arrived on Dec 23. Like a Christmas miracle, with 3 Zarbees a day, and lots of rest, I'm able to make it to Christmas Eve services with no sneezing, coughing, or any cold symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Chriselle V

customer_reviews.title: While I like the immune support these vitamins provide
customer_reviews.text: While I like the immune support these vitamins provide, I believe it is appauling the amount they now charge. I used to pay 15$ a bottle and now the company is charging double. I switched to a different brand at a lesser price and SAME quality. Very dissapointed in the upcharge.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: These could be real! Or could be nonsense.
customer_reviews.text: So I’m kinda torn because my whole life I’ve been the person that called nonsense on Monavie, herbal life, thrive, and all the latest things that make you better. We had some elderberry cough medicine in the cabinet for the kids so one day that I got started getting sick I took some. The next day it was gone! That never happens to me. I always get worse before getting better. So I’m in limbo. I bought these to try to see if it really works or if it was a mere coincidence. I guess time will tell. They taste alright though, way better than the syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Scott

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED and possibly Counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: Expired product! On 3/15/2020 I received 3 bottles in subscription order that expired 10/2019! 5 months expired the day I received! And they were melty and sticky inside the bottle....absolutely terrible and not what I received the first time! Completely different packaging, I question whether counterfeit product. To be clear, authentic Zarbee’s Elderberry is amazing and I’m a big fan...this is a terrible delivery of poor and old product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Health never tasted so good
customer_reviews.text: The jury's still out on the health benefits of the elderberry supplement and especially this gummy version. I wouldn't be surprised either way. At any rate, we're supplementing with elderberry this fall/winter in conjunction with hyperhydration and good general nutrition in order to avoid flu or flu-like viruses. And it's not hard to do. These gummies are delicious. I kinda feel like my 3-year-old who constantly says he "has boogies" in order to get more vitamins. They're delicious.
customer_reviews.author: JSB Morse

customer_reviews.title: Eh save your money
customer_reviews.text: I know people swear by this but I started taking this daily in September and since then I actually somehow got sicker than I have in any other year! So much so I got pneumonia bad this year. I am sure it works for some folks but I think I won’t waste the money anymore as it seemed to have the opposite effect on me. I love their products just this one I feel for so much hype and not enough reward for me.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: I believe it works
customer_reviews.text: My toddler had been basically sick constantly after starting day care. It was really terrible and we couldn't get a break fron it. He started taking one a day for going on 3 months. He has yet to get sick. I cant say for sure this is why but i do believe it has helped in my opinion. The reason i didnt give a 5 is because i can't 100% prove that. Also gave a 4 for flavor because my son loves them and i do too but my daughter doesn't like them but she's so picky. I think most any kid would love them. They are coated in sugar FYI
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Corn Syrup
customer_reviews.text: It contains corn syrup... no bueno.. I canceled my subscription and going back to Sambucol. It's less expensive too. Everytime a small company gets acquiried by the giant co they change receipe of the products just like Burt Bees when it was purchased by Clorox. Zarbee is owned by J&J I vote with my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Yum! I Only Wish they Recommend We Eat More
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good & (bonus!) these chews (I was confused by the “easy to swallow” question asked during this review) are in the shape of a bee! Cute. I think these help me stay healthy but, frankly, I’m not a doctor & I’ve no plans to become one. I am, however, interested in how plant’s & flowers can heal. Ever since my days in Bolivia and the Miracle that is coca tea, I’m like “plants are the OG medicine.” I’ve searched for alternatives to keep healthy and I’d put these chews within that bucket. Pros: Taste Fun to chew Shape of a bee Cons: I’d like more quantity in the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Skyes

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet. Terrible return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. Too much added sugar and too sweet. Much prefer other brands that are not laced with sugar. Will not repurchase and seller is not accepting a return.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arnhym

customer_reviews.title: Take that! Immune system!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter is obsessed with elderberry flavor 😩 She calls it “dark medicine” and doesn’t want to take anything else but-this! I only give her 1 gummy a day however and our family of 3 is taking it everyday. So far, so good. We haven’t gotten sick to the point of missing school/work (knock on wood) and my little one just started preschool, and it’s exposed to germs all day. Only sniffles/mild cough. We will continue to take it as it seems that it is helping our immune system.
customer_reviews.author: Asil

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product
customer_reviews.text: I do love the product and love the vit C, zinc honey combo however I did not like the hard crunchiness. I am going to try the gummie next time. I wanted the honey because its also a natural antibiotic but I didn't taste any and the tablet was just too hard to chew for me. I don't get the flu or colds and I believe its because of the Vitamin C and zinc that I take. So its a good product just maybe a younger person to chew on hard tablets. I don't want to break a denture.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Conaty Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not very Natural!
customer_reviews.text: This product is called Zarbee's Naturals but it's not very natural! I was shocked to see on the ingredient list that it contains corn syrup! My son gets very sick when he eats anything with corn syrup or high fructose corn syrup. I thought Zarbees was a better company than this! They should not have corn syrup as an ingredient!
customer_reviews.author: Bcarjl

customer_reviews.title: A must have for me
customer_reviews.text: I order another one of these before I let the other go empty, they’re that good! I love the taste, sort of similar to boysenberry jam. I bought other elderberry supplements from another brand and didn’t like the artificial taste they had. I haven’t been sick at all since I started using these in May even with kids and traveling. Plus, I work in an ER and am exposed to a lot of germs. I also give children’s elderberry supplements to my kids and they haven’t gotten sick yet either.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C

customer_reviews.title: VERY tasty and nice to have this time of year.
customer_reviews.text: These are very tasty and something I pop this time of year for a little extra immune boost. They have a rough "sugar-type" coating which make them even better than some of the other plain smooth gummy supplements. I just have to try not to eat them like candy!
customer_reviews.author: KRNRNNP

customer_reviews.title: Sick free!
customer_reviews.text: I SWEAR by these!! My kids start taking these once they go back to school and I swear they have kept them healthy! The only difference is I give them one a day and if I see them start to sneeze or cough I up the dose to the recommendation for a few days. My kids say they taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I have been taking these for about 6 months now and so far neither of us have gotten any type of sickness. Before finding out about these we would take a multivitamin but still ended up catching a cold or some type of illness due to her working in health care. Since taking these neither of us have been sick at all. Great product and I’d highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nick pops

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but high cal for 3
customer_reviews.text: There are 40 calories per serving. If you take it twice a day that is 80 calories. These taste good, but they aren't THAT good. Flavor is mildly sour, with sweet berry flavor. Texture of gummy is more like gelatin, than a gummy.
customer_reviews.author: Serene Night

customer_reviews.title: YUM
customer_reviews.text: The whole family absolutely loves the taste and texture of these gummys. My husband had been fighting chest congestion for over a month, and after less than a week of taking these, he's starting to finally feel better. Everyone around us is starting to get a spring cold, and we're feeling healthier than ever. Will definitely repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Kept me healthy when everyone else was sick!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and really helped keep me healthy even when my son and some coworkers were sick! Hopefully they’re strengthening my immune system against COVID19! I’ve been traveling a lot lately and have been to large gatherings, and I still feel great, as long as I take 3 of these daily!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but kinda pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly no clue if these work, but they taste great. I didn’t get sick at all while taking them, but I have also been following quarantine guidelines, using lots of hand sanitizer and wearing a mask. But I figure a little immune boost can’t help. However, the price for these seems to keep creeping up so I have been exploring other products.
customer_reviews.author: CMorgan

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins are sweet, and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: Zarbee's Naturals Elderberry Immune Support Vitamins are delicious and effective! This flu season, my family and I took Zarbee's Immune Support, washed our hands thoroughly and frequently and got our flu vaccine and am happy/proud to say that all 6 of us dodged ever getting the flu or any other common winter bug. These vitamins are sweet, and easy to take. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CPennock

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids 6, 4, and 2 had been fighting a cold for weeks and couldn’t kick it. 3 days taking these and they were symptom free! I give them each half of one.
customer_reviews.author: millerhn

customer_reviews.title: Zarbee's Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these from my local drug store, but since COVD-19 and the news of how these are good for your immune system spread like wildfire. I can't find them anywhere. So, thanks Amazon. These are great! The health benefits are amazing and they are made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Ordinarygirl

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat for kids with benefits
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people take elderberry syrup to ward off sickness. If you have ever tasted it, you'll understand why my children will not take it. These gummies, however, are amazing. They are yummy and my kids think they are treats. They also seem to be doing well at keeping them healthy. (Knock on wood!)
customer_reviews.author: Clandahlina

customer_reviews.title: Helpful at getting over allergy and cold symptoms.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for about a year now. I take these and my toddler takes the children's version. Its not proven or scientific, but I feel as though taking these really helps me get over the allergy and cold-like symptoms faster. My toddler and I have bad allergies and usually get the flu 1-2 times per year and a cold 5-8 times per year. While taking these gummies during this last year, my son had the flu once and a cold maybe 3 times and I never got the flu and had a cold twice.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: More like candy than a real supplement
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other elderberry supplements, these are not a good value or great product. Directions for use recommend 3 gummies at least, per day and the are like eating gumdrop candy! I suppose if you are looking for "healthy" candy... very disappointed. I will be returning to my regular elderberry supplement..
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Bass

customer_reviews.title: they taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: these taste HORRIBLE! They want you to take 3 at a time..but i couldnt do it. I managed 2 at a time. they made me sick to my stomach to eat but so many people swear by this elderberry thing-so im going to rough through it. besides the taste, I think it had an awesome price point for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Texastexasss

customer_reviews.title: Helps Keep Me Healthy
customer_reviews.text: With two little kids that tend to bring home every illness known to man these gummy bears have definitely helped to reduce the frequency and severity of illness they share with me. I don't mind the taste, a little sour but, my kids don't like them (they think they are too sour.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Santala

customer_reviews.title: It worked! Cough killer
customer_reviews.text: I had a terrible cough, lasting several weeks and simply not going away. The suggested 3 gummies a day seemed a little steep to me and would cause the product to only last 20 days. Nonetheless, I started taking these gummies, 3 a day as suggested. 2 days later, the cough was gone. This product is going to be a 'go to' moving forward. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: trevor hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I pick local berries and make syrup every year before flu season arrives. These are a nice boost with added immune support.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Made nephews I'll...
customer_reviews.text: Bad batch maybe? They didn't like the taste so maybe that should have been the first sign??? Made them ill. NO THANK YOU Minus 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ❤️🇺🇸❤️

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different elderberry gummies and these are by far my favorite. They have the softest texture and the flavor is not too sour like some other ones I've tried. They are pricey though but most elderberry supplements are.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: too much sugar, too may gummies for 1 serving
customer_reviews.text: 3 gummies is one serving??? really??? that's nuts. For the price that's just silly. And I'm all for sugar in vitamins. Better then those terrible fake sugars that leave an awful after taste. But this is way too much. I used to wash them under warm running water until the extra layer of sugar melted away, but even so its still too sweet. I love all the other zarbees products but this was just a deal breaker. I switched to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews about how good these Elderberry gummies were, I ordered them for my family. I hate to say the flavor was awful, we tried to take them but it was not easy because there is something about the flavor that makes them kind of gross. They are also very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Sugar drops
customer_reviews.text: I heard such wonderful things about this product so I opted to give it a try. Looking at the ingredients this is straight candy just as it tastes. For the price it isn’t worth it in my mind better off making it yourself and supporting a holistic Business that does
customer_reviews.author: Maz-ina

customer_reviews.title: Takes great!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended these to me. They are delicious, I think I stayed healthier this year while taking these. I have them on my subscribe and save to get a bit cheaper and monthly. My three year old loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Superhero Lover

customer_reviews.title: Corn syrup!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed to find these are loaded with corn syrup
customer_reviews.author: L233

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and I honestly think it works. However, the price has doubled since I first purchased it a few months ago. For that reason I am taking away two stars. It feels like price gouging to me, and there are other comparable products for far less.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very tart and gritty
customer_reviews.text: These are so tangy and gritty. It's a big pill to begin with, and they want you to chew 3 a day. They're awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: I received an expired product with the expiration date of 10/2019. I’ve been ordering Zarbee’s Elderberry from Amazon for the past 1.5 years and never experienced an issue. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pack

customer_reviews.title: Undecided about effectiveness, but taste is good
customer_reviews.text: I had read about these elderberry gummies on a blog, and ordered without carefully reading the ingredient list myself. I don’t understand why they are coated in added sugar. Nonetheless, they taste pretty great and my kids ask for them every day. I think we have stayed relatively healthy throughout this flu season, so maybe they have helped. I’m just not sure.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: My secret weapon during cold and flu season
customer_reviews.text: I work in a middle school where germs run rampant from fall through spring. I take at least one of these daily and I haven’t fallen ill when the rest of my coworkers have come down with a cold or flu. Elderberry is my secret weapon and the taste of these is almost too good.
customer_reviews.author: Kwright63

customer_reviews.title: Its a family affair!
customer_reviews.text: Love what it does for you. My kids have not gotten a cold this entire winter which has not been too good. If they did come down with some symptoms I just give them an extra gummy and they have been doing great. No claims here just what I have experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Borges

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These taste so good, like candy! Not sure if they worked or not but I didn’t get a cold while taking them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really a great product, we take them every time we feel ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really a great product, we take them every time we feel run down or if we are around anyone who is sick. I even give one to my 3-year-old, as one of these has the same levels of vitamins as 3 of the kids gummies. Along with diffusing and cleaning with essential oils and drinking ACV, we haven't been sick all winter. These gummies also taste great and my kid loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: So perfect
customer_reviews.text: read the ingredients. I hesitate to write a good review cuz I don't want the price to go up, or for Amazon to run out. These are so amazing. I've stopped my D, C, Zinc and E! This has it all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Sickeningly sweet & sugary
customer_reviews.text: The product is coated in a grainy sugar and when combined with the product's purple grape juice flavor it makes for a sickeningly sweet combination.
customer_reviews.author: Emporio

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been taking these for two winters and has not gotten sick once. We briefly tried another brand but the taste wasn't as good so we switched back and now these are the only brand we buy.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Keeping me in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: As a public school teacher, I need all the support I can get to keep me from getting sick. I began taking this in August. It has helped me recover days faster than my colleagues and I am great deal less sick then they are. It is worth a try for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: NE0831

customer_reviews.title: super gummies for my health
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor and the easy way to take your vitamins for the immune system!
customer_reviews.author: Toni L Leech

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these 2 weeks after the pandemic for myself. They taste great. Keep in mind they are coated with sugar for those who are not a fan of sugar or are worried of a bitter taste..these are sweet. I feel less tired and energetic after a few weeks of taking these. I will continue to purchasing these. I would say get these when they are priced at $12. These are sold elsewhere at $16. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris.B

customer_reviews.title: Bye, toddler germs
customer_reviews.text: The best-tasting elderberry supplement we’ve tried. We’ve got two little ones who practically swim in germ pools at school. So far we’ve been able to fight off of drastically shorten any colds and viruses. Last winter, we didn’t take these, and we were sick all season long. These are a game-changer!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like a sour gummy but the fruit flavor is good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help avoid cold/flu this season. They taste a little sour at first. Kinda like a sour gummy but the fruit flavor is good. And never got sick this season
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, I hate taking pills so these chewable dummies are perfect for me. I wanted the vitamin C and zinc combination for my immunity support during this corona virus situation.
customer_reviews.author: 2cool4u

customer_reviews.title: one of the best gummies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my son who has trouble swallowing pills but have the whole family taking it with the virus going around to build up immunity. It is so good in flavor and the texture reminds me of a grape. This is something I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: tdhensley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the flavor and I love not making the juice with to the mess and time....it works for us! It also helps that I completely TRUST the brand and what the make and stand for.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Swear by it, but hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: Elderberry is an absolute go-to whenever I'm feeling a cold coming on. I pop these gummies several times a day, and insist my family do the same. We've used with my toddler and I swear the length and severity of colds is much shorter and more mild than dealing with a cold with Tylenol and decongestants.
customer_reviews.author: i.p. daly

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at my son's home was in need of this. So, I bought it to give to them (along with younger children one) and it seems to have helped in the rotten spring we'd had in Georgia this year
customer_reviews.author: atllaw191

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My kids usually get sick four or five times in the winter. We’ve been giving them these and they haven’t gotten sick once. I have these on auto order!
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: The childproof cap WILL NOT come off
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these several times and never had an issue. However, I have a brand new bottle that is unable to be opened. I have had 4 people try to push and turn the child proof cap and it will not budge or come open; it just clicks. We aren't able to access the supplements at all because of the cap. My husband is going to try to saw open the container tonight so we can at least get to the supplements we paid for! Ridiculous and time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Really yummy
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, you'll want to eat more than you're supposed to. They have quite a bit of sugar per serving, so be aware if you're counting carbs. The ingredients are just what I was looking for in an immune booster, and I haven't been sick since I started taking them...knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lee

customer_reviews.title: They taste great and they work!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I feel like I'm coming down with something, I take these. They definitely work well along with other prevetatives like nasal spray if you have a history of allergies. They taste pretty good too!
customer_reviews.author: Oceanlove4

customer_reviews.title: and felt better by the next day
customer_reviews.text: Took it at first sign that I was getting ill, and felt better by the next day. Was that due to this product, I can't definitely say that, but there is real science behind elderberry as being immune boosting, and anti viral.
customer_reviews.author: katlantic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the taste & these really help boost up my system a bit while traveling abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Elly C

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. They have the same active ingredients as their kid's version but are a better value. The flavor tastes more like grape which is great!
customer_reviews.author: EChaves

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love these and my daughter actually eats them! They are a little too sweet tho. Covered in sugar but the benefit my kids get from taking them is worth the sugar lol
customer_reviews.author: Averyrlong

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: If you like gummies they are very sweet. Me personally I love the flavor but I have a sweet tooth! It’s like eating candy so keep them away from kids. The bottle recommend taking 3 a day. Don’t know if it’s effective or not at this point but I should have no problems taking 3 a day!
customer_reviews.author: Randerson

customer_reviews.title: Immune boost
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my toddler to help boost his immune system after battling cold after cold from daycare. We have seen a HUGE improvement!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: they taste ok
customer_reviews.text: I think they taste ok my daughter didnt like them have only had them for a little while so dont know how effective they are
customer_reviews.author: lizzy sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to take and work very well! I have taken these several times when someone is sick at home and these typically help me to stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Reed

customer_reviews.title: A delicious must
customer_reviews.text: These have been key to staying well this season. They are quite delicious. I recommend them to everyone and we will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly...it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I seem.to always get sick with all the grandbabies going to school and coming to visit...so I shy away during cold and flu season. I will admit I was skeptical but last year took these and helped take care of the little ones when they was sick and it skipped me!!! Idk if it was the zarbees or not but I bought them again to take during sick season this year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but I'm pretty sure this is BS
customer_reviews.text: I took these religiously for months and still got really sick. Granted, I am dealing with daycare germs. But I'm still pretty sure this is a placebo effect for most of y'all and this really does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not great.. could be better
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take daily to help with keeping sickness away. I personally am not a fan of the taste although I am usually a big fan of Zarbee products. I wish it contained less sugar as well
customer_reviews.author: MamaKay071727

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & effective
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. And zero reaction from this highly reactive gluten free gal. I love how elderberry shortens colds and viruses, and this product absolutely helped me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry is a plus
customer_reviews.text: Chewable gummy that I’ve been taking for 6 months and feel great and healthy. I’m over 60- suppose to strengthen immune system - I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carol McGee

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavor kids like it will order again. Just wanted to keep our immune system up with all the sickness going around.
customer_reviews.author: Godbygirl

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummy pills. Started getting congested so I had the whole family taking them. Cleared up the congestion and no one else got sick. Even my picky grandson takes them without a fuss.
customer_reviews.author: leftbrain4all

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite elderberry -- I look forward to taking it every morning because it's so delicious, so never miss a day. But, for only 20 days worth of product, the price is kind of steep. I'm trying a different elderberry product that's far more economical now, but may be back just for taste alone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: More like candy than something good for you
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, easy, enjoyable chew , I would never swallow like a pill, cause it tastes too good. If it really helps your immune system that's a plus. I'm, Lovin' It!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sohn

customer_reviews.title: since they are gummiest one needs to chew then, and not swallow.
customer_reviews.text: I ate it as a candy, one at a time or else it induces me a bad case of migraine. This is a personal reaction. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: provence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Health Gummies!
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are amazing! When my husband or I feel sickness coming on we take two and it really seems to keep us from getting sick. I also took them after I had already gotten a cold and I was well in 48 hours instead of what would normally be a week later. I stocked up on these for the winter. We only take them when we feel like we are getting sick or are sick. We do not take them every day. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins that work
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins worked great for me when I felt a cold coming on. They helped knock it out quickly. They are a bit pricey imo but they work, so I’ll likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Stay healthy
customer_reviews.text: Used to take Elderberry, Vitamin C and Zinc all separately to keep immune system healthy. Now just 3 good tasting gummies a day. Bought more for daughter and 2 elementary school grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: They are not super chewy like gummy candy or anything but they are good and easy to take. One thing that i always worry about with gummies is the taste and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Magic batch

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Knock on wood; we didn't have any flu/cold symptoms in our house and I really think it is bc of taking vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dhayer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t a day I don’t take this. I work in a clinic and an assisted living. My immune system is awesome with this!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: My family love this, and it clearly reduced the times we ...
customer_reviews.text: My family love this, and it clearly reduced the times we got sick and the severity of colds. I have a toddler who goes to day care so this is big!
customer_reviews.author: SueZanne

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These work wonders. .. my daughter usually is sick the entire time she is in school ... my family of 4 have been taking these and they work great ... only thing is you have to take 3 of them a day so they go quickly, or her than that the taste is great and it works
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Adams

customer_reviews.title: Sugar cubes
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these especially because I love this brand. Extremely sugary and way to sweet. Felt like I was eating a sugar cube. Waste of money. Definitely over priced
customer_reviews.author: Milah

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on the elderberry wagon. I think the liquid may work better but these are great for someone who cant stand the liquid. They taste great and keep well.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: High sugar for something that is to boost immune system
customer_reviews.text: There's actually a lot more sugar in these than I thought would be. Other brands have less sugar. But my kid loves them.
customer_reviews.author: kittykatt

product_meta.title: Zarbee's Naturals Elderberry Immune Support* with Vitamin C & Zinc, Natural Berry Flavor, 60 Gummies
product_meta.description: Flavor:Natural Berry| Size:60 Count (Pack of 1)Zarbee's Naturals Sleep with Melatonin Gummies Supplement safely and effectively remedies occasional sleeplessness. This drug-free supplement is made with melatonin, a drug-free and non-habit-forming ingredient that helps promote peaceful sleep. These gummies use natural fruit extracts for a great taste without artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners. Founded by a physician looking for chemical-free alternatives for his family, Zarbee's Naturals Sleep with Melatonin Gummies Supplement is made with carefully-sourced, wholesome ingredients, and no unwanted additives. Don't forget to add Zarbee's to the supplies list this back to school season.
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL SUPPORT: These Immune Support Gummies provide you with vitamins A, C, D, E & Zinc. They're made with real elderberry extract, an antioxidant that gives our gummies their delicious taste.
VEGAN FRIENDLY: These Gummies are made with vegetarian-friendly & vegan ingredients. While other gummies use animal gelatin, we use fruit pectin to give our gummies their soft, springy texture.
IMMUNE SUPPORT FOR THE FAMILY: We’ll be there to help your whole hive be ready for anything with our immune-supporting lineup for the entire family, made with ingredients like real elderberry & zinc.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS: From vitamins that help support immune systems to cough syrups that soothe, powerful natural ingredients like dark honey, elderberry, & agave form the backbone of our products.

WE'LL BEE THERE: Healthy families start with wholesome ingredients for everyone from babies & toddlers to kids & adults. Try our vitamins & supplements, immune support, cough & throat relief & more!; Contains citric Acid

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
